entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ContentRootPath normalization / DataProtection Discriminator #40964
  • Blazor Webassembly always getting ERR_CONNECTION_RESET #40962
  • Make shadow copy a non-experimental feature #40961
    7.0-preview4
  • UsePathBase regex #40959
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40957
  • Add ASP.NET Core Visual Basic project template #40954
  • Coding Standards: naming private variable members #40951
  • HttpLogging middleware should have an option to filter out endpoints #40950
    .NET 7 Planning
  • The type or namespace name 'class' could not be found in visual studio 17.1.2 #40949
  • dotnet watch run crashes when files get modified #40946

Closed

  • Consider removing Mono specific code in SqlServerCache #40345
    Backlog
  • Scaffolding Identity in .Net Core 6 #40938
  • Don't invert the UseProgramMain option in project templates in Visual Studio #40917
    7.0-preview4
  • Referencing incompatible dependency in a Blazor WebAssembly project will result in an unhelpful error #40157
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Host blazor webassembly app with different base path is not working as described in documentation #40205
    7.0-preview3
  • Blazor Custom Elements not rendering as/when expected #40318
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor - Model Binding InputText and String #40785
  • Update SpaProxy to work with http-proxy-middleware 2.x. #40875
  • Is .net core compatible with IIS Webdav module ? #40903
  • Program.Main.cs for the worker template should not use Company.WebApplication1 for the namespace #40942

PullRequests

Created

  • Caching common HttpResults types #40965
    area-web-frameworks
  • Typo: Update WebApplicationFactoryClientOptions.cs comments #40963
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Dead code? #40956
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Trim Http.Extensions #40561
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Remove Mono specific Code #40920
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • updating date in weatherforcast from 2018 to 2022 #40960
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Increase a few IIS test timeouts #40884
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Update spa-templates to latest commit #40947
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Friendlier exception when invoking JS from outside a WebView context #40943
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Include arm64 payloads for hosting bundle #40709
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Enable trimming on various abstractions projects #40948
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Fix Kestrel conn close on shutdown while response is writing #40933
    area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add RouteHandlerContext as parameter to IRouteHandlerFilter.InvokeAsync #40919
    area-runtime
  • Implement IProvideEndpointMetadata & IProvideEndpointParameterMetadata #40926
    area-runtime
  • Backport UseProgramMain template option #40945
    blocked, area-mvc, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Blazor Prevent Stale Connection Usage Upon Reconnect #40702
    area-blazor
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707
    area-infrastructure
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
